Data scraped via Pywikibot using PAWS (see README).

```{r dependecies and data}
# dependencies
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)

# get data
article_contains_commited_suicide <- read.csv("list of pages containing \"committed suicide\".csv")   
# process
title_contains_suicide <- article_contains_commited_suicide %>%
  mutate(page_title = as.character(page_title)) %>%
  filter(str_detect(page_title, "suicid"))

# write to disk
title_contains_suicide %>% write_csv("list of pages containing \"committed suicide\" whose title contains \"suicid\".csv")
```
